Literature.Title: Effects of lysine-to-arginine substitution on antimicrobial activity of cationic stapled heptapeptides.
Literature.Author: Luong HX, Kim DH, Lee BJ, Kim YW

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:<1% Hemolysis=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=6.3µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25µM),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=50µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=75µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=37.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=25µM)
